title: vandaruLvAi murugA
sahitya:
vandaruLvAi murugA parama sukham tandaruL mAl marugA


anupallavi

  sondamuDan unai ninaindiDum anbar dayALa en inba maNALa manam irangi


caraNam    pAlinum tEninum kaniyinum inikkum pArvahi bAlanE sharavaNabhavanE
nIlamayilil varum karuNAkaranE ennEramum ennuDan nI viLaiyADavE
